description: This file defines a frontend component named 'MenuItem' for a food delivery platform, using LightningJS. It includes the component's template, state, watchers, and event handlers for user interactions.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a menu item card with image, name, price, and an 'Add to cart' button.

methods.name: buttonClicked
methods.description: Handles the 'Add to cart' button click event, adding the item to the shopping cart in the store.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with theme and formatted price text.

methods.name: watchers.item
methods.description: Watches for changes in the item prop to update the displayed price accordingly.

search-terms: MenuItem template with image and price
